title: Curse of the Faceless Man (restored, colorized) (1958, sci-fi, imdb score: 4.9)

sources.title: Curse Of The Faceless Man Colorized Movie 720p
sources.description: Curse of the Faceless Man is a 1958 independently made American low-budget black-and-white horror film , produced by Robert E. Kent , directed by Edward L. Cahn , that stars Richard Anderson , Elaine Edwards, Adele Mara , and Luis van Rooten . Science fiction writer Jerome Bixby wrote the screenplay. The film was theatrically released in the U.S. by United Artists as a double feature with It! The Terror from Beyond Space . The film's storyline concerns a Roman gladiator , buried alive in Pompeii during the eruption of Mount Vesuvius in A.D. 79, who returns to life in modern times to find the reincarnation of the woman he loves.
